dimensions.label: Intellectual Humility
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new knowledge with a humble and inquiring mind, seeking to learn from others.
Your FarTwin will approach new knowledge with confidence in their own abilities, potentially dismissing opposing views.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach complex problems with a logical and methodical mindset, seeking to break them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will approach complex problems with an intuitive and creative mindset, potentially relying on instincts rather than data.

dimensions.label: Social Presence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be comfortable and confident in social situations, taking the initiative to engage with others.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social interactions, potentially feeling drained by excessive socializing.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express their creativity through artistic endeavors, such as painting, music, or writing.
Your FarTwin will express their creativity through practical applications, such as inventing or problem-solving.

dimensions.label: Argumentation Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage in debates and arguments?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach debates and arguments with a confrontational attitude, seeking to 'win' the argument.
Your FarTwin will engage in debates and arguments with a constructive attitude, seeking to learn from others and improve their own perspectives.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks with a focus on perfection, potentially spending excessive time on individual details.
Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks with an efficient and practical approach, focusing on productivity rather than precision.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others in a team?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaboration with an independent mindset, preferring to work alone and making decisions without input from others.
Your FarTwin will approach collaboration with a cooperative attitude, valuing the contributions of others and working together towards a common goal.
